articles.title: Florida officials tell public not to touch manatees during sex
articles.description: Manatees, which mate in herds of a single female and many males, are dying at record rates in Florida, prompting conservation groups to sue the EPA.

articles.title: Rainwater no longer safe to drink anywhere due to 'forever chemicals'
